name: XplatGenerateReleaseNotes
description: Generates a release notes file in a format of your choice from the build or release history
author: Black Marble

inputs.name: outputfile
inputs.label: Output file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the Markdown file to export e.g. $(Build.ArtifactStagingDirectory)\releasenotes.md if within a build workflow

inputs.name: outputVariableName
inputs.label: Output variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the variable that the markdown output should be assigned to for use later in your workflow.

inputs.name: templateLocation
inputs.label: Template Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the template file source, file in source control or in line.

inputs.name: templatefile
inputs.label: Template file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the Markdown template.

inputs.name: emptySetText
inputs.label: Text for empty sets
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is the text that will be placed in the generated release notes if there are no work items or changesets/commits.

inputs.name: delimiter
inputs.label: Delimiter for tags
inputs.helpMarkDown: The delimiter is used to separate field filter and tags in the @@WILOOP:TAG1:TAG2@@ block markers. Default is :

inputs.name: fieldEquality
inputs.label: Expression equality
inputs.helpMarkDown: The field equality symbol used to in field filter e.g. @@WILOOP:System.Title=123@@ block markers. The default is =

inputs.name: anyFieldContent
inputs.label: Symbol for 'any field value'
inputs.helpMarkDown: The value to put in WILOOP constructs to match any contents e.g. @@WILOOP:System.Title=*@@. The default is *

inputs.name: overrideStageName
inputs.label: Name of stage (override)
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set uses this stage name to find the last succesful deployment, as opposed to the currently active stage (Release usage only)

inputs.name: stopOnRedeploy
inputs.label: No generation on re-deploy
inputs.helpMarkDown: Do not generate release notes of a re-deploy. If this is set, and a re-deploy occurs the task will succeeds with a warning

inputs.name: sortWi
inputs.label: Sort WI
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true will sort work items by type, if false then it will leave the work items in default order

inputs.name: showOnlyPrimary
inputs.label: Show Primary only
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true only show WI/CS associated with primary release artifact

inputs.name: searchCrossProjectForPRs
inputs.label: Cross Project For PRs
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true will try to match commits to Azure DevOps PR cross project within the organisation, if false only searches the Team Project

inputs.name: gitHubPat
inputs.label: GitHub PAT
inputs.helpMarkDown: To expand commit messages stored in a private GitHub repos a PAT needs to be provided, it is not required for repo stored in Azure DevOps or public GitHub repos

inputs.name: customHandlebarsExtensionCode
inputs.label: Custom Handlebars Extension
inputs.helpMarkDown: A custom Handlebars extension written as a JavaScript module e.g. module.exports = {foo: function () {return 'Returns foo';}};

instanceNameFormat: Generate Release Notes based on Release Comparision API
